title: Milestones & Mazita - Orbital Tembere
heading: Milestones & Mazita
description: Iyi mifananidzo yemakore akawanda chikamu chegumi netatu Mercosul Bienal muPorto Alegre, Brazil, yakarongedzwa naMarcelo Dantas. Yakave yakanyorwa kwenguva refu yeLumen Prize 2022 - Futures Award. Yakahwina zvakare ArtSat Chikamu chemakwikwi eCubeDesign 2021, yakasimudzirwa neBrazilian Institute of Space Research (INPE).
